resources.string: Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
Show errors on tabs with a message
Dots in portrait, tabs in landscape
Show Back button on first step
The default implementation of a dotted stepper
Dotted stepper styled through view attributes in the layout file
Dotted stepper styled through view attributes set in Activity theme
The default implementation of a stepper with a horizontal progress bar
Horizontal progress bar stepper styled through view attributes in the layout file
The default implementation of a tabbed stepper
Tabbed stepper styled through view attributes in the layout file
The default implementation of a stepper without any particular current step indication
Tabbed stepper which also shows an error on a tab when it occurs
Tabbed stepper which also shows an error on a tab when it occurs with a custom error color
Tabbed stepper which also shows an error on a tab when it occurs and keeps it displayed when going to a previous step
Tabbed stepper which also shows an error on a tab with error message below step title when it occurs
Shows a dotted stepper when the device is in portrait mode and tabs when in landscape
Shows how to use a custom PageTransformer when switching between steps
Shows how to use a BlockingStep for long-running operations when going to next steps.
Stepper feedback sample for long running operations. Different feedback types can be selected.
Shows how to set different labels and icons for the bottom navigation buttons.
Show how to display a Back button on the first step of the stepper layout.
StepperLayout used with pure Views instead of Fragments
Shows how to navigate to the next steps without clicking on the bottom navigation buttons
Shows how to pass data from one fragment to the next by using parent Activity
Shows how to disable clicking on tabs in a tabbed stepper
Shows how to hide bottom navigation
Shows a styled stepper layout with custom fonts & colors
Shows how to set the color of bottom navigation button programmatically (instead of via XML)
